xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsp="http://www.w3.org/ns/ws-policy" xmlns:wsp1_2="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/09/policy" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <wsp:Policy wsu:Id="GedServicePortBinding_MTOM_Policy"> <ns1:OptimizedMimeSerialization wsp:Optional="true" xmlns:ns1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/09/policy/optimizedmimeserialization"/> </wsp:Policy> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://service.server.ged.mapping.samples.petals.ow2.org/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="consulter" type="tns:consulter"/> <xs:element name="consulterResponse" type="tns:consulterResponse"/> <xs:element name="documentInconnu" type="tns:DocumentInconnuException"/> <xs:element name="stocker" type="tns:stocker"/> <xs:element name="stockerResponse" type="tns:stockerResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="stocker"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="reference" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="type" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="file" type="xs:base64Binary" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="stockerResponse"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="consulter"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="reference" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="consulterResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="file" type="xs:base64Binary" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="DocumentInconnuException"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="message" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="reference" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="stocker"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:stocker"/> </message> <message name="stockerResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:stockerResponse"/> </message> <message name="consulter"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:consulter"/> </message> <message name="consulterResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:consulterResponse"/> </message> <message name="DocumentInconnuException"> <part name="fault" element="tns:documentInconnu"/> </message> <portType name="GedService"> <operation name="stocker"> <input wsam:Action="http://service.server.ged.mapping.samples.petals.ow2.org/GedService/stockerRequest" message="tns:stocker"/> <output wsam:Action="http://service.server.ged.mapping.samples.petals.ow2.org/GedService/stockerResponse" message="tns:stockerResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="consulter"> <input wsam:Action="http://service.server.ged.mapping.samples.petals.ow2.org/GedService/consulterRequest" message="tns:consulter"/> <output wsam:Action="http://service.server.ged.mapping.samples.petals.ow2.org/GedService/consulterResponse" message="tns:consulterResponse"/> <fault message="tns:DocumentInconnuException" name="DocumentInconnuException" wsam:Action="http://service.server.ged.mapping.samples.petals.ow2.org/GedService/consulter/Fault/DocumentInconnuException"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="GedServicePortBinding" type="tns:GedService"> <wsp:PolicyReference URI="#GedServicePortBinding_MTOM_Policy"/> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" style="document"/> <operation name="stocker"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="consulter"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="DocumentInconnuException"> <soap:fault name="DocumentInconnuException" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> </binding> <service name="GedService"> <port name="autogenerate" binding="tns:GedServicePortBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:9000/gedService"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

<w:definitions name="FactureService" targetNamespace="http://facture.mapping.samples.petals.ow2.org/" xmlns:w="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://facture.mapping.samples.petals.ow2.org/" version="1.0"> <xs:element name="consulter" type="tns:consulter"/> <xs:complexType name="consulter"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="identifiant" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="consulterResponse" type="tns:consulterResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="consulterResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="file" type="xs:base64Binary"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="stocker" type="tns:stocker"/> <xs:complexType name="stocker"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="identifiant" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="file" type="xs:base64Binary"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="stockerResponse" type="tns:stockerResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="stockerResponse"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="factureInconnue"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="identifiant" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> </w:types> <w:message name="stocker"> <w:part element="tns:stocker" name="parameters"/> </w:message> <w:message name="stockerResponse"> <w:part element="tns:stockerResponse" name="parameters"/> </w:message> <w:message name="consulter"> <w:part element="tns:consulter" name="parameters"/> </w:message> <w:message name="consulterResponse"> <w:part element="tns:consulterResponse" name="parameters"/> </w:message> <w:message name="factureInconnue"> <w:part element="tns:factureInconnue" name="parameters"/> </w:message> <w:portType name="FactureService"> <w:operation name="stocker"> <w:input message="tns:stocker"/> <w:output message="tns:stockerResponse"/> </w:operation> <w:operation name="consulter"> <w:input message="tns:consulter"/> <w:output message="tns:consulterResponse"/> <w:fault message="tns:factureInconnue" name="factureInconnue"/> </w:operation> </w:portType> <w:binding name="FactureServicePortBinding" type="tns:FactureService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <w:operation name="stocker"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <mapping:service-provider-operation xmlns:ns10="ged" xmlns:ns11="soap12" xmlns:ns12="wsu" xmlns:ns18="soap" xmlns:ns20="wsu" xmlns:ns22="ns14" xmlns:ns24_="ns27" xmlns:ns26_="ns25" xmlns:ns29="ns18" xmlns:ns30="ns29" xmlns:ns36="w" xmlns:ns39="ns28" as-xpath-expr="true">false()</mapping:should-return-fault> </mapping:output-transformation> <w:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </w:input> <w:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </w:output> </w:operation> <w:operation name="consulter"> <mapping:service-provider-operation xmlns:ns10="ged" xmlns:ns11="soap12" xmlns:ns12="wsu" xmlns:ns18="soap" xmlns:ns20="wsu" xmlns:ns22="ns14" xmlns:ns11="soap12" xmlns:ns12="wsu" xmlns:ns18="soap" xmlns:ns20="wsu" xmlns:ns22="ns14" xmlns:ns24_="ns27" xmlns:ns26_="ns25" xmlns:ns29="ns18" xmlns:ns30="ns29" xmlns:ns36="w" xmlns:ns39="ns28" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <mapping:should-return-fault as-xpath-expr="true">not(boolean(/*[local-name()='consulterResponse']))</mapping:should-return-fault> </mapping:output-transformation> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <w:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </w:input> <w:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </w:output> <w:fault name="factureInconnue"> <soap:fault name="factureInconnue" use="literal"/> </w:fault> </w:operation> </w:binding> <w:service name="FactureService"> <w:port binding="tns:FactureServicePortBinding" name="edpt-feaffb70-b70e-11e6-b671-024219fc5093"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8084/petals/services/factureService"/> </w:port> </w:service> </w:definitions>

con:configuration.scriptText: // check that we received no attachment assert messageExchange.responseAttachments.length == 0
// check that we received no attachment assert messageExchange.responseAttachments.length == 0
